docket_entries.description:
Argued. For petitioners: Christian J. Grostic, Assistant Federal Public Defender, Cleveland, Ohio.  For respondent: Masha G. Hansford, Assistant to the Solicitor
General, Department of Justice, Washington, D. C.
docket_entries.description_html:
Argued. For petitioners: Christian J. Grostic, Assistant Federal Public Defender, Cleveland, Ohio.  For respondent: Masha G. Hansford, Assistant to the Solicitor
General, Department of Justice, Washington, D. C.

docket_entries.description: Judgment VACATED and case REMANDED.  Barrett, J., delivered the opinion of the Court, in which Roberts, C. J., and Thomas, Kagan, and Kavanaugh, JJ., joined, and in which Sotomayor and Jackson, JJ., joined as to all but Part II-B.  Sotomayor, J., filed an opinion concurring in part and concurring in the judgment, in which Jackson, J., joined.  Jackson, J., filed an opinion concurring in part and concurring in the judgment.  Alito, J., filed a dissenting opinion, in which Gorsuch, J., joined.
docket_entries.description_html: Judgment VACATED and case REMANDED. Barrett, J., delivered the opinion of the Court, in which Roberts, C. J., and Thomas, Kagan, and Kavanaugh, JJ., joined, and in which Sotomayor and Jackson, JJ., joined as to all but Part II-B. Sotomayor, J., filed an opinion concurring in part and concurring in the judgment, in which Jackson, J., joined. Jackson, J., filed an opinion concurring in part and concurring in the judgment. Alito, J., filed a dissenting opinion, in which Gorsuch, J., joined.
